course_title: Pediatric Acute Care Nurse Practitioner I
class_notes: Online Asynchronous with some synchronous sessions. On-campus intensives: Feb. 4-5 & March 18-19.
course_description: Students are introduced to the care of the acutely ill or injured child. Emphasis is on the recognition, management, stabilization and restoration of health potential post-emergency health crisis for children with respiratory, cardiac, neurological, orthopedic, skin, eye, surgical and infectious disease.
sections: Class Nbr: 3226, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Brown, Status: Open
